Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
presentation.MenuController
public class MenuController extends Object
Controller orchestrating CLI interactions for admins and members.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Constructs a new controller wiring the display, input, and service dependencies.

      public MenuController(MenuDisplay menuDisplay, InputHandler inputHandler, LoginService loginService, AdminService adminService, MemberService memberService, BookService bookService, LoanService loanService, ReminderService reminderService, AdminActions adminActions)
      Constructs a new controller wiring the display, input, and service dependencies.
      Parameters:
      menuDisplay - the display helper
      inputHandler - the input reader/validator
      loginService - the login service
      adminService - the admin service
      memberService - the member service
      bookService - the book service
      loanService - the loan service
      reminderService - the reminder service
      adminActions - admin action helper
